description: Hello, I'm Erick, a 21-year-old web programming enthusiast. Currently, I'm studying a Software Development and Management Engineering. Programming has become a daily habit due to my enthusiasm for technology. I'm specializing in the frontend area. I love learning new technologies and staying up to date with the latest trends in web development. In my free time, I enjoy playing video games and practicing basketball.
descexp1: I participated in the development of Saloncito, an educational platform inspired by Google Classroom, designed to facilitate class organization, task delivery, communication, and academic evaluation.
descexp2: I developed a note-taking application with React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. The application allowed users to create, edit, and delete notes, as well as authenticate and store notes in the database, the user can also share notes with other users by creating groups.
puntoexp1.1: ● I implemented the user interface in React and TypeScript, prioritizing accessibility and user experience.
puntoexp1.2: ● I collaborated in the development of the backend, using Node.js, to ensure a scalable and efficient architecture.
puntoexp1.3: ● I designed user manuals and technical guides for developers, facilitating the understanding of the platform.
puntoexp1.4: ● Result: A modern educational solution that demonstrated teamwork skills, agile development, and handling cutting-edge technologies.
puntoexp2.1: ● I implemented reusable components, optimizing project development and maintenance.
puntoexp2.2: ● We designed the application with a hexagonal architecture, facilitating the separation of responsibilities and ensuring efficient scalability.
puntoexp2.3: ● Notitas allows users to organize daily tasks, add quick notes, and create groups to share information with friends in an intuitive way.
puntoexp2.4: ● Result: An innovative multiplatform solution that demonstrated skills in architecture design and team collaboration.
